title: Corsair actually killed it - Corsair Voyager A1600
description:
Check out Jackery’s Explorer 1000 Pro at: https://geni.us/aL7Ys

Corsair just released their new streamer-focused laptop, the Voyager A1600, so Alex took a look to see if this tall boy is truly the best option for the streamer on the go.

Buy a Corsair Voyager a1600: https://geni.us/Qid5

Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at https://lmg.gg/7s34e

► SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE: https://floatplane.com/ltt 
► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS: https://lmg.gg/scsponsors
► PODCAST GEAR: https://lmg.gg/podcastgear
► SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE: https://www.floatplane.com/

FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE
---------------------------------------------------  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShrtCrctYT
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/shortcircuityt
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@linustech
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShortCircuitYT

CHAPTERS
---------------------------------------------------
0:00 Alex has questions
0:09 Unboxing
0:26 Exterior impressions
1:00 IO walkthrough
1:34 It's TALL.
1:53 Build quality impressions
2:15 Sponsor - Jackery
2:41 Interesting trackpad feature
3:11 Built-in Stream Deck impressions
4:51 Keyboard/trackpad impressions
5:37 Laptop specs and comparison to ROG Zephyrus G15
8:20 Gaming benchmark while "streaming"
9:35 Regular gaming benchmark 
10:39 Speaker impressions vs XPS 15
11:15 Display impressions
11:38 Webcam impressions
13:00 Teardown and upgrade impressions
14:14 Pricing and overall thoughts
15:00 Outro
